short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Easily and quickly search Amazon and other online stores from your selected text

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Select text, and search Amazon, eBay, and Temu for products matching your text! You can configure the extension to choose which stores you would like to search on.
